comments.raw_text: Matt, is this dup of 1638652? If E10s is disabled, how is it possible? browser.tabs.remote.autostart is not set.

comments.creator: mreudaimon@msn.com
comments.text:
Guys, Thanks for all the time you seem to be putting in.... Sorry as stated before i am a complete novice with computers. Do you have any suggestions as to how i can rectify this. Is the issue just with me, or a Firefox issue.
I have received about 10 emails but have little understanding of what they say.
Kind Regards.
comments.raw_text:
Guys, Thanks for all the time you seem to be putting in.... Sorry as stated before i am a complete novice with computers. Do you have any suggestions as to how i can rectify this. Is the issue just with me, or a Firefox issue.
I have received about 10 emails but have little understanding of what they say.
Kind Regards.
comments.author: mreudaimon@msn.com
jan@ikenmeyer.eu
comments.raw_text: Open your start menu, type "env", open "Edit the system environment variables", click on the "Environment variables" button, search for a `MOZ_FORCE_DISABLE_E10S` entry, select it, click on the "Delete" button, click on "OK" and restart Win10.
comments.text: Open your start menu, type "env", open "Edit the system environment variables", click on the "Environment variables" button, search for a `MOZ_FORCE_DISABLE_E10S` entry, select it, click on the "Delete" button, click on "OK" and restart Win10.
comments.creator: jan@ikenmeyer.eu

comments.raw_text:
